title: Walnut Creek CONDO. 1 Bed 1 Bath. Las Juntas Roble Honey Trail
posting_body: ['Walnut Creek condo.', 'One bedroom one bath.', 'Cozy 700 square feet.', 'No tenants since remodeled, new kitchen, appliances, counter tops, floors, doors, moldings, overhead recessed LED lighting, paint, etc.', 'This is a great opportunity to rent a wonderful ground level unit in a very quiet community.', 'This exceptional complex is conveniently located across the street from Pleasant Hill BART.', 'The Iron Horse Trail is practically right out your front door for walking, biking, recreation and relaxation.', 'Walk in closet.', 'This spacious unit comes complete with an inside laundry.', 'There is a fully fenced and enclosed private backyard, approximately nine feet by thirteen feet, and six foot fences.', 'Central HVAC (heating and air conditioning).', 'It is located within minute to Pleasant Hill BART and Iron Horse bike trail.', 'Conscientious access to parks, shopping, restaurants, and freeways.', 'Covered carport parking.', 'Also part of the highly coveted Walnut Creek schools.', 'Owner pays:', 'HOA', 'Waste management', 'PG&E', 'Water', 'BASIC internet.', 'Rental Requirements:', 'NO pets.', 'NO smoking.', 'Security deposit (1.5 months’ rent)', 'Minimum one-year lease term', 'Move-in costs: first month’s rent plus security deposit on approved credit', 'Renter’s Insurance REQUIRED.', 'Gross monthly income must be at least 3 times the monthly rent amount.', 'Great credit and rental history.']
